EmailTemplate.description: IN USEThis email is triggered to remind the applicant of submission deadline
EmailTemplate.name: Application Submission Deadline Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Application Submission Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.OwnerFullName},
This is to remind you that the Deadline({!Application__c.ApplicationDeadline__c}) to submit the application for Funding Opportunity({!Application__c.AnnouncementNumber__c}) is approaching in 5 days.
If you are not the Primary Applicant of your Organization, please contact them immediately in order to submit the application. Their contact information is listed in your Organization's Profile under Registered Owners tab.
If you are encountering any technical issues, please send an email to systemadmin@dcdoh.gov
Sincerely,
District of Columbia(DC) - Department of Health(DOH)
Enterprise Grants Management System(EGMS)
